title: [Large-Scale] Context-Based Science Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Workshop for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational curriculum design experience and understanding of adult learning theories
context.additional_context: Intensive development of context-aware competencies for pre-service/in-service teachers to design effective science education for adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze adult learning scenarios reflecting diverse contexts (simple-chaotic) and match three appropriate instructional methods
Learners can identify two or more contextual barriers in science education design using a learning awareness framework
Learners can draft context-centered science learning modules applicable to vocational training institutions through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
